title: Im tilted before the game even starts
body: I get 5 matches low prio for not accepting the afk check rito wtf

replies.body: If you're flagged for being AFK in too many matches there is a chance for you to be placed in that [**low priority queue**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714). Essentially, the other 4 people in those 5 matches were left to try and win that match without you. Keep in mind that if for any reason you keep leaving games, that LPQ could be extended.
